ygData.subject: RE: Hey guys!
ygData.msgSnippet: Kow, why most of the kakis I introduced to play DS kena stucked in the training ground? LOL.  Actually myself also kena stucked there for sometme, until I
ygData.messageBody:
Kow, why most of the kakis I introduced to play DS kena stucked in the
training ground? LOL. Actually myself also kena stucked there for sometme,
until I placed the weap back to the altar where I get it, the door will
open.

If ya eye still cannot align with ya hand (hehe eye kena pasted stamp),
then restart a new char lor. Btw, there are many useful commands in the
game, better check out DS game sites (eg + and - key to zoom in and out,
macro spell icons to key 1-5, tab key for map, L key for locations etc).

If you like Diablo, you sure like DS ;)
